entries.text: Pouch of ancient coins (enough for a bribe or two)
Rune-carved charm: 'Ancestor-Warded' (invoke once to resist undead fear)
Old Nord map fragment (creates advantage: 'I Know a Safer Route')
Dragonbone shard (crafting permission, not a full item yet)
Potion: Minor Healing Draught (clear 1 physical stress once)
Scroll: Candlelight or Flames (one scene use)
Bundle of silver bolts (aspect: 'Silver-Tipped')
Silvered dagger (Weapon:1 vs beasts, but suspicious in Jorrvaskr)
Wanted posters and informant notes (advantage: 'Names and Faces')
Coin purse from confiscated victims
Crude wolf-pelt cloak (aspect: 'Hunter's Mask')
Officer's signet or orders (advantage: 'Chain of Command')
Spare rations and bandages (clear 1 stress after scene)
Captured banner (compel bait and morale tool)
Throwing axe / short spear (Weapon:1 for one scene)
Letter implying Thalmor interest (story hook)
Iron or steel sword, notched but serviceable (Weapon:1)
Dented shield (Armor:1 until scene ends)
Bedroll and travel rations (aspect: 'Prepared for the Road')
Small pouch of coin (1d6 x 5 gold)
Propaganda pamphlet - Imperial or Stormcloak (story prop)
Dog-eared letter from home (compel hook: 'Someone Waiting Back Home')
Enchanted blade: 'Winter-Bitten Edge' (invoke once to add +2 vs undead/ice)
Silver-inlaid greatsword (Weapon:2 vs beasts, attention magnet)
Commander's map case (advantage: 'Know the Passes')
Fresh bread and dried meat (clear 1 mental stress: comfort)
Warmaiden's steel: spare blade or arrow bundle (Weapon:1 supply)
Arcadia's remedy: potion clearing 1 physical stress
Belethor's curio: odd trinket with one free invoke on 'Curious Object'
Gray-Mane or Battle-Born token (social advantage in Whiterun circles)
Guard's confiscated lockpick set (Burglary tool, raises eyebrows)
Intact Imperial supply crate: 50 gold + minor enchanted gear
Stormcloak war-axe, still sharp (Weapon:2 for one scene)
Legate's sealed orders (story hook: Thalmor cipher fragment)
Whiterun guard helm, dented (Armor:1, recognized in Whiterun)
Field surgeon's kit (create advantage: 'Battlefield Triage' once per scene)
Scavenged arrows x8 (Shoot supply for next scene)
Battle-Born strongbox: documents relevant to Thalmor sub-plot
Farengar's annotated dragon scroll (Lore +1 on dragon topics, one scene)
Jarl's signet wax seal (social leverage in Whiterun Hold)
Court wizard's reagents: one free invoke on 'Prepared Alchemical Mixture'
Map of Whiterun Hold with patrol notes (create advantage: 'Know the Routes')
Imperial dispatch case: coded letter hinting at Thalmor oversight
